title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Based on Open Badge Learning (OBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: Learning design incorporating digital badges to deepen scientific expertise for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can construct three or more self-directed learning pathways by applying open badge design principles in science fields.
Learners can receive peer-evaluated assessments of their scientific experiment design and data analysis competencies using a digital badge system.
Learners can derive five educational environmental factors to consider when introducing OBL (Outcome-Based Learning) through mixed research methods (interviews/surveys).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
